Uses of Package
checkersGUI

Packages that use checkersGUI
checkersGUI Provides the components for a GUI to allow a user to interact with the classes used to simulate a Checkers game. 
 

Classes in checkersGUI used by checkersGUI
CheckersGUI
          A simple graphical user interface to allow humans and AI CheckerPlayers to play each other.
CheckersTrainer
          A graphical user interface designed to allow the user to have two groups of CheckersPlayerInterfaces play each other and keep track of the game outcomes.
